Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-54350 affecting package iperf3 for versions less than 3.18-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-54350 affecting package iperf3 for versions less than 3.18-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package iperf3 is earlier than 3.18-2, affected by CVE-2025-54350
